main event: A ground visual observation of a bright object descending and breaking up was reported at Kingsley Field, Oregon on February 8, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 1 to 2 seconds,It left a white bright trail and produced no sound,After it disappeared behind a hill, a flash was seen covering 10 percent of the horizon,The sighting was evaluated as an astronomical meteor,The observing officer, Capt Gerald A Harris, is described as a completely reliable officer.
sighted object: a bright object breaking up in the sky
witness description: Capt Gerald A Harris, a rated duty radar observer
